text: The fecal antibiotic sensitivity results revealed gentamicin to be sensitive in 95% of the cases, azithromycin in 50%, enrofloxacin in 25%, cefotaxime in 20%, and tetracycline in 5% of the cases. The order of sensitivity was gentamicin > azithromycin > enrofloxacin > cefotaxime > tetracycline. Maximum resistance (100%) to amoxicillin and least resistance (5%) to gentamicin were observed.
